aka: 我的婚姻不是我的婚姻(台)

cast.name: 雅各布·麦卡锡 Jacob McCarthy
奇科·库尔尼亚万 Chicco Kurniawan

writer.name: 迪亚·库伦贝加什维利 Dea Kulumbegashvili

trans_title: 我的婚姻不是我的婚姻(台)
introduction: In a time of great expectation and pressure stemming from the traditions of his upbringing, Aris-a gay Muslim teenager living in rural Indonesia-finds himself increasingly drawn to his well-traveled English teacher despite his upcoming marital preparations to a woman he harbors no romantic feelings for. With his whole life planned out for him by his parents, Aris struggles with the conflicting notions of tradition, duty and his own personal idea of happiness.
